trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaEngine" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaEngine" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: The application domain.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application base.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程基。

trans-unit.source: The application base.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序基。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application path.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程序的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the running assembly generated by Run method.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 Run 方法生成的运行程序集的引用。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the currently running assembly.
trans-unit.target: 对当前正在运行的程序集的引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly version.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置程序集版本。

trans-unit.source: Closes the engine.
trans-unit.target: 关闭该引擎。

trans-unit.source: Causes the engine to compile the existing source state.
trans-unit.target: 使引擎编译现有的源状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> on successful compilation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功编译，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compiled root namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已编译的根命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Closes the engine.
trans-unit.target: 关闭该引擎。

trans-unit.source: Causes the script engine to compile the existing source state.
trans-unit.target: 使脚本引擎编译现有的源状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> on successful compilation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功编译，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The site from which the specified source items are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 指定的源项目所在的站点。

trans-unit.source: Directs the engine to load source items.
trans-unit.target: 指示引擎加载源项。

trans-unit.source: The compiled state of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 引擎的编译状态。

trans-unit.source: Specifies debugging information contained in the .PDB file.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含在 PDB 文件中的调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Saves the compiled state of the script engine; optionally, it also saves debugging information.
trans-unit.target: 保存脚本引擎的编译状态；它还可选择保存调试信息。

trans-unit.source: The site to which source state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 对其保存源状态的站点。

trans-unit.source: Directs the script engine to persist its source state to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指示脚本引擎将其源状态保存到指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the engine moniker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引擎名字对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the engine name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引擎名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the engine site
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引擎站点。

trans-unit.source: The error number to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的错误号。

trans-unit.source: Returns an error.
trans-unit.target: 返回错误。

trans-unit.source: An exception with the specified error number.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定的错误号的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error locale.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置错误号。

trans-unit.source: Provides evidence for the purpose of validating the current object's identity.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于验证当前对象的标识的证据。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an Evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 Evidence 对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the execution evidence.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置执行 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the compilation failed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编译是否失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether debug information is generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否生成调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a Boolean value that signifies whether the script engine produces debug information when the Compile method is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取指示脚本引擎会不会在调用 Compile 方法时产生调试信息的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to produce debug information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成调试信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的选项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets implementation-specific options for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取引擎实现特定的选项。

trans-unit.source: The value of the option.
trans-unit.target: 选项的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的选项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets implementation-specific options for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取引擎实现特定的选项。

trans-unit.source: The value of the option.
trans-unit.target: 选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether there is a compiled state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否具有已编译的状态。

trans-unit.source: Provides a notification that the initialization phase is complete.
trans-unit.target: 提供初始化阶段已完成的通知。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示引擎是否关闭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the source is compiled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示源是否编译。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the source is compiled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果源已编译，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether debug information is supported.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否支持调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current in-memory representation of the item differs from the persisted representation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该项的当前内存中表示形式是否与保留的表示形式不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the in-memory representation differs from the persisted representation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内存中表示形式与保留的表示形式不同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is compiled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示引擎是否编译。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current in-memory representation of the item differs from the persisted representation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该项的当前内存中表示形式是否与保留的表示形式不同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示引擎是否初始化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the engine is running.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示引擎是否正在运行的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that reports whether the engine is currently in run mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取报告引擎当前是否处于运行模式的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the engine is in run mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果引擎处于运行模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string value provided as identifier.
trans-unit.target: 作为标识符提供的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the supplied identifier is valid for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 检查提供的标识符是否对引擎有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the identifier is valid; otherwise, it returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识符有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string value provided as identifier.
trans-unit.target: 作为标识符提供的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the supplied namespace is valid for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 检查提供的命名空间是否对引擎有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the namespace is valid; otherwise, it returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空间有效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of IJSVsaItem objects, which represent all items added to the engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取 IJSVsaItem 对象的集合，该集合表示添加到引擎的所有项。

trans-unit.source: The collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the programming language supported by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取由该引擎支持的编程语言名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the programming language.
trans-unit.target: 编程语言的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the geographical locale and language in which to report exception messages.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在报告异常消息时所使用的地理区域设置和语言。

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the locale in which exception messages are to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在其中报告异常消息的区域设置的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the compiled state.
trans-unit.target: 加载编译状态。

trans-unit.source: The compiled state.
trans-unit.target: 编译状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已加载程序集。

trans-unit.source: The site from which the specified source items is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 从中加载指定源项的站点。

trans-unit.source: Directs the engine to load source items from their point of persistence, as specified by the host-provided object.
trans-unit.target: 如宿主提供的对象所指定的那样，指示引擎从持久性点加载源项。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the display name of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引擎的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 引擎的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name table.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置名称表。

trans-unit.source: The flags to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the precondition flags.
trans-unit.target: 设置前置条件标志。

trans-unit.source: Removes the engine from the running state and disconnects automatically bound event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 从运行状态中移除引擎，并自动断开与绑定事件处理程序的连接。

trans-unit.source: Resets the compiled state.
trans-unit.target: 重置编译状态。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the cached assembly for the engine, as specified by its root moniker.
trans-unit.target: 为引擎将缓存程序集无效化，由其根名字对象指定。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a script engine's root moniker.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取脚本引擎的根名字对象。

trans-unit.source: The root moniker of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 引擎的根名字对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置根命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the root namespace used by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取该引擎使用的根命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the engine.
trans-unit.target: 引擎的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Initiates execution of compiled code in the engine and binds all event handlers
trans-unit.target: 启动引擎中已编译代码的执行，并绑定所有事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: The compiled state of the script engine.
trans-unit.target: 脚本引擎的编译状态。

trans-unit.source: Specifies debugging information contained in the .PDB file corresponding to the PE (portable executable).
trans-unit.target: 指定与 PE（可移植可执行文件）对应的 .PDB 文件中包含的调试信息。

trans-unit.source: Saves the compiled state of the engine; optionally, it also saves debugging information.
trans-unit.target: 保存引擎的编译状态；它还可选择保存调试信息。

trans-unit.source: The site to which source state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 对其保存源状态的站点。

trans-unit.source: Directs the engine to persist its source state.
trans-unit.target: 指示引擎坚持其源状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the script language.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置脚本语言。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的选项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for the option being set.
trans-unit.target: 所设置的选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets implementation-specific options for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 为该引擎设置特定于实现的选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the option to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的选项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for the option being set.
trans-unit.target: 所设置的选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets implementation-specific options for the engine.
trans-unit.target: 为该引擎设置特定于实现的选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the host-implemented IJSVsaSite object that is used by the engine to communicate with the host.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取由宿主实现的 IJSVsaSite 对象，该引擎使用此对象与宿主通信。

trans-unit.source: The host-implemented object.
trans-unit.target: 宿主实现的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the startup class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置启动类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the startup instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置启动实例。

trans-unit.source: The root moniker to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的根名字。

trans-unit.source: Validates the root moniker.
trans-unit.target: 验证根名字对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current version of the language compiler supported by the engine, in the form <c>Major.Minor.Revision.Build</c>.
trans-unit.target: 获取由该引擎支持的语言编译器的当前版本，格式为 <c>Major.Minor.Revision.Build</c>。

trans-unit.source: The current version.
trans-unit.target: 当前的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of IVsaItem objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置子对象的集合。
